name: Mexican Mermaid Toro (Privada Cigar Club Exc.)
additionalNotes:
https://privadacigarclub.com/shop/la-sirena-mexican-mermaid/

This one was in the PCC "Brian's Box" for May '22 and Brian Desind says it was a PCC exclusive vitola.  Round, not box-pressed like the other Mex. Mermaid toro in the DB.
